Room.Name: Plasnelt Road
Room.ShortDescription: Plasnelt Road was named after a geological area to the north of the village.
Room.LongDescription: The village of Brownhaven sits at the western end of Gotland Glenn, near the eastern edge of the Nartiz Mountain Range. It's a rather idealic spot, but its proximity to Mount Aphinix means its sometimes subject to raids by mountain trolls. On the north side of the road there is a repair shop.
